meanings.definition: Relating to the study of proteins and their structures.
meanings.sent1: The proteomic research lab focused on understanding how proteins work in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use proteomic techniques to examine the building blocks of living organisms.
meanings.sent3: The proteomic puzzle was challenging, but the researchers were determined to solve it.
meanings.sent4: Her proteomic approach to organizing data helped uncover hidden patterns.
meanings.sent5: The proteomic analysis revealed a complex network of protein interactions.

meanings.definition: Involving the analysis of all the proteins in a cell or organism.
meanings.sent1: The proteomic study aimed to identify and characterize all the proteins present in the cell.
meanings.sent2: Researchers used proteomic methods to explore the entire protein landscape of the organism.
meanings.sent3: The proteomic investigation uncovered a surprising variety of proteins in the sample.
meanings.sent4: His proteomic research shed light on the intricate web of protein functions within the cell.
meanings.sent5: The proteomic approach provided a comprehensive view of the protein composition in the organism.
